reviews.comment: "Duolingo has been a game-changer for my language learning! I love the gamified approach, and it makes learning French feel like less of a chore. The streak feature really keeps me motivated, and the bite-sized lessons fit perfectly into my busy schedule. Highly recommend!"

"A great way to practice Spanish daily. The lessons are short and simple, which is perfect for beginners. Sometimes the translations can be a little odd, but overall it’s a fun, engaging way to learn a new language."
"The app is okay for basic language learning, but it doesn’t go deep enough for intermediate learners. I still use it for vocabulary practice, but I wish it offered more advanced content."

"I've tried other language apps, but Duolingo keeps me coming back every day. The lessons are interactive and fun, and the app is constantly being updated with new features. I’ve learned so much German in just a few months!"
"It’s decent for getting started with a language, but the ads are so annoying if you’re not paying for the premium version. The lessons feel repetitive after a while too."

"It’s a fun app for learning a new language, but it doesn’t replace formal education. I think Duolingo is great for supplementing language courses, but don’t expect to become fluent just from using this."
Worst app ever. Bird threatened to kill my family. He said spanish or vanish.

sources.name: The American Sign Language (ASL) University Playlist
Farsi: a Complete Course for Beginners

reviews.comment: I learned a lot 10/10 would recommend! I learned how to draw a box
